mapper.select: SELECT id, cooperation_name cooperationName, status, create_by createBy, update_by updateBy, create_name createName, update_name updateName, create_date createDate, update_date updateDate, DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createDateStr, DATE_FORMAT(update_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updateDateStr FROM car_biz_cooperation_type WHERE id = #{id}
select count(1) from car_biz_supplier where cooperation_type = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into car_biz_cooperation_type (
cooperation_name,
status,
create_by,
update_by,
create_name,
update_name,
create_date, update_date ) values (
#{cooperationName},
#{status},
#{createBy},
#{updateBy},
#{createName},
#{updateName},
now(), now() )
mapper.update:
update car_biz_cooperation_type set
cooperation_name = #{cooperationName},
status = #{status},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_name = #{updateName},
update_date=now() where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, cooperation_name cooperationName, status FROM car_biz_cooperation_type WHERE status = 1
